features: [10.3'' 2K FHD LCD In-cell Screen] TOSCIDO Tablet adopts TDDI process 2000x1200 resolution In-cell screen with T-Color2.0 color optimization technology to reduce blue light and reduce eye damage, while making colors more vivid and richer in detail.

[Extreme Screen Ratio] TOSCIDO Tablet has ultra-narrow bezel, compared to other brands' tablets of the same size, it has better visual effect, thanks to TDDI integration technology, which completely integrates the display and touch screen into a single unit, effectively reducing reflection and improving light transmission rate. Even after long time use, it will not easily make eyes feel fatigue.

[2023 latest Android 12 system] Equipped with the latest Android 12 system, compared to Android 11, Android 12 has been upgraded in all aspects of system operation, with faster response time and more attention to user privacy and security. It also adds many interesting and convenient operations, which greatly improves the user's operating experience.

[8GB+7GB RAM+128GB ROM+2T Expandable ] TOSCIDO Tablet is equipped with 8GB super RAM memory, enable RAM expansion technology, you can expand the RAM up to 15GB, running speed increased by 38%, whether you are playing games or working, TOSCIDO Android 12 Tablet can give you a smooth experience. 128GB of storage space is enough to store your favorite movies, photos and apps. If you're a content creator, the Android tablet comes with a TF card slot and 2TB of expandable storage for your creative needs.

[Unisoc T606 Octa-Core 12nm CPU] TOSCIDO Tablet is equipped with Spreadtrum's Octa-Core high-performance chip, which has 50% more performance than the previous generation 9863A, with better computing power and better performance.
[Long-last Battery Use ]The TabletWith the 8000mAh ultra Large capacity battery,Ideal for extended use without worrying about power.

[2 in 1 Tablets ] This 10.3 inch tablet PC has a 2 in 1 professional working mode. It can connect the mouse, stylus, and keyboard through the Bluetooth function, and transform it into a small notebook for use with a folding leather case. Good gift for colleagues, students, writers, and business people.

[Excellent after-sales service] The TOSCIDO Tablet have more than 10 years of experience in making and selling tablet PCs, and have a very professional after-sales customer service, offering a 2-year free guarantee and lifetime customer service support, so that your purchase is free of worries.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm glad I took the plunge and gave this brand a try.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought this tablet several weeks ago for a trip I was taking. Because I was going to be flying, I didn't have space to carry my heavier laptop, so I opted for this very lightweight tablet. I looked around at several brands, as I usually stick with name brands. And I wanted something a little beefier in the memory department. But I didn't want to pay a huge amount of money for something I was just going to use for games, reading emails, and surfing the net. I had never heard of Toscido, but I liked the specs on this one and I really liked the price. After scoping out reviews in multiple places, I decided to give this a try and crossed my fingers that it would be fine. I am so glad I made the choice. When I received the tablet, it was more than halfway charged already, so it didn't take long for it to reach 100% when I plugged it in. I then proceeded to download all the games and ebooks I planned to use on it. I tend to play match 3 type games along with adventure puzzle-type games and word/object search. While they may not be as graphically intensive as some of the higher-level games that require a lot of juice, the ones I play still have some pretty decent graphics. This tablet handled them without any problems. I was especially pleased when playing the adventure escape games and object search games. I had no problems connecting to Wi-Fi networks, including my mobile hotspot, for which I was immensely grateful.The battery lasted a good while. On the last day of my trip, I started at 100%. I went through three different airports and flights periodically connecting to my mobile hotspot, and playing my games. When I got home, I turned off the tablet and put it to the side. The video I've included with this review was taken almost four weeks later. In the video, I've tried to show how long it takes to initially power up. It also shows that four weeks after all-day use, the battery is only down to 40%. That's pretty amazing, in my opinion.The tablet came with a nice little Bluetooth keyboard and a tablet cover. I opted to buy a different keyboard that folds since the one that came with the tablet doesn't fit into the tablet cover and would have been a little bulkier to carry. It also came with a stylus that has a handle for wrapping around the wrist. I was most pleased to see the power adapter included with the package, as a lot of USB-powered electronics I've purchased lately don't seem to include those anymore. I was very happy with everything that came included.I was pleasantly surprised to be contacted by the company a few days after I received my package. They wanted to let me know about an update that was needed to ward off a potential problem connecting to networks (which I never had) and to remind me to register the product as soon as possible to activate the warranty. Apparently, there is a short time frame to do that to receive the warranty, which I wasn't aware of. I appreciated the proactive communication from the company.Overall, I really like this TOSCiDO 10.3 inch Android Tablet. I'm glad I took the plunge and gave this brand a try. YMMV, but in my opinion, it is a quality product with some good specs for the price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The TOSCiDO 2023 Android 12 Tablet is a budget-friendly tablet that offers a lot of features for the price. It has a large 10.3-inch display, 8 GB dedicated RAM + 7 GB virtual RAM, and 128GB of storage that can be expanded up to 2TB. It also has a powerful 8-core processor and a long-lasting 8000mAh battery.One of the best things about it is 10.3-inch IPS display has a resolution of 2000 x 1200, which is sharp and clear. The colors are also vibrant.It includes everything you need, Bluetooth keyboard, headphones, wireless mouse, and all USB cables you need and a power block, a case to protect it that also double as a stand.It’s also very powerful. The 8-core processor and the amount of RAM make it quick and responsive, even when running multiple apps at once. The 8000mAh battery also provides long-lasting battery life, so you can use the tablet all day without having to worry about running out of power.Overall, is a great budget-friendly tablet that offers a lot of features for the price. It has a large display, powerful processor, and long-lasting battery. If you're looking for a tablet that won't break the bank, this is a great option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Was looking for an upgrade from my old tablet
reviews.reviewText: I was looking to upgrade from my old Vankyo tablet and came across this item, which had some impressive specs. The most impressive feature is the screen quality. It has nice dark blacks with sharp edges and provides a very enjoyable watching experience. Sound is decent for a tablet - nothing earth-shattering, so I would normally just pair it with a nice Bluetooth speaker. The BT feature worked well and had no issues pairing a mouse, keyboard and headphones.Battery life is pretty good, but could be better. I did have it on about 68-70% brightness, though, so more testing might be needed for a final summation of that feature. The included mouse was a bit more plastic-ky that I would have liked, so I bought a replacment, but the keyboard works great. Overall, I think it was great value for the money and I find myself using it much more than my old tablet because it's much quicker with a much better screen.
